1.0.0-alpha5.name: drupal/xoxo_entity

security-coverage.message: Project has not opted into security advisory coverage!

1.0.0-alpha5.description: Acts like the Proxy pattern in order to expose XoXo handled objects as entities. This module only exists because it's fun, it also allows these objects being fieldable. You can use it if you need to display XoXo object through Views or integrate them better to core.
